_comments: Applet that changes the LIFX colors as it gets darker outside

body.scriptCode: var trigger_hour = DateAndTime.everyHourAt.CheckTime; var colorKey = trigger_hour.toString(); var colors = { '17':'#F3F2EB', '18':'#F7F2E6', '19':'#F9EFE0', '20':'#FBEFDC', '21':'#FBE5C6', '22':'#FBE5C6' }; if (trigger_hour < 17) { skip('Lifx.color'); } else if (trigger_hour < 22) { Lifx.color.setAdvancedOptions('color: ' + colors[colorKey] + '; brightness: 1; duration: 12'); } else { skip('Lifx.color'); }
